column8: ALOR SETAR: A freak storm blew away a huge tent that was set up for a bazaar at the 63rd PAS Muktamar in Kota Sarang Semut Saturday evening.Several people were injured in the 7pm storm with a 20-second video released on Facebook showing the extent of damage caused by the collapsed tent.The storm came just before a fund-raising dinner attended by PAS leaders was supposed to start at another tent which was not affected.The dinner has been cancelled and the area sealed off to allow personnel to clear the debris.A PAS Badan Amal officer said the storm blew away the roof of the tent at the Haraki Expo and over 20 booths were destroyed."The whole tent collapsed after the roof was blown away."Several people were injured but not seriously. They were sent to the Sultanah Bahiyah Hospital for treatment," said the officer who did not want to be named.The muktamar is expected to go on Sunday with its final day on Monday as the tent in which the meeting is held is not affected by the storm.Read more at http://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2017...sBUGlkK3bkTi.99
